titles.title: Support for Community Bridges Act
A bill to amend title 23, United States Code, to provide for funding for off-system bridges, and for other purposes.
Support for Community Bridges Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

bill.summary:
Support for Community Bridges Act
This bill sets aside a portion of Federal-aid highway funding for repairing structurally deficient bridges that are not part of the National Highway System and prescribes a formula to allocate this funding to states based on their share of such bridges.
